data_table.description: Echo Mitral Valve Prolapse (MVP) Progression, Offspring Exam 5. This data table includes measurements of the mitral valve leaflet height, thickness and projection, annular dimensions, regurgitation jet height, coadaptation height, and displacement in two-dimensional views or on M-mode echocardiography.

variable.name: mvpleafnum
variable.comment: Character variable MVPLEAFNUM was coded as either "mono" or "bi" for scans with CATEGORY = mvp. For all other codings of CATEGORY MVPLEAFNUN was coded as . = Unknown.

variable.name: mvpmonotype
variable.comment: Character variable MVPMONOTYPE was coded as either "ant" or "post" for scans with MVPLEAFNUM = mono. For all other codings of MVPLEAFNUM MVPMONOTYPE was coded as . = Unknown.

variable.name: annulus1
variable.description: 2-D mitral valve annular dimension - 1st measurement iteration

variable.name: annulus2
variable.description: 2-D mitral valve annular dimension - 2nd measurement iteration

variable.name: jetht1
variable.description: 2-D mitral regurgitation jet height - 1st measurement iteration

variable.name: jetht2
variable.description: 2-D mitral regurgitation jet height - 2nd measurement iteration

variable.name: coadapt1
variable.description: 2-D mitral valve leaflets coadaptation height - 1st measurement iteration
variable.comment: Ratio between posterior leaflet projection 1st measurement and annular dimension 1st measurement (pstproj1/annulus1)

variable.name: coadapt2
variable.description: 2-D mitral valve leaflets coadaptation height - 2nd measurement iteration
variable.comment: Ratio between posterior leaflet projection 2nd measurement and annular dimension 2nd measurement (pstproj2/annulus2)

variable.name: antproj1
variable.description: 2-D mitral valve anterior leaflet projection - 1st measurement iteration

variable.name: antproj2
variable.description: 2-D mitral valve anterior leaflet projection - 2nd measurement iteration

variable.name: pstproj1
variable.description: 2-D mitral valve posterior leaflet projection - 1st measurement iteration

variable.name: pstproj2
variable.description: 2-D mitral valve posterior leaflet projection - 2nd measurement iteration

variable.name: comments
variable.comment: Character variable Blank = Not filled in. Not blank = Filled in.
